description:
NIVEA Refreshing Biodegradable Facial Cleansing Wipes for NormalCombination Skin enriched with Vitamin E remove even waterproof makeup and mascara With 97 naturally derived ingredients and microplastic free formula youre caring for your face and the environment

NIVEA Refreshing Biodegradable Facial Cleansing Wipes for Normal Combination Skin contains Vitamin E to refresh your skin daily Perfume alcohol paraben and silicone free making them suitable for normal and combination skin This face wipe formula contains 97 naturallyderived ingredients and are a biodegradable plantbased tissue In addition the ecofriendly face wipes offer a refreshing formula to leave your skin gently cleansed moisturised and cared for Our practical pack includes 25 cleansing wipes for easy and quick makeup removal at home or on the go The skin compatibility of the facial cleansing wipes has been dermatologically and ophthalmologically approved

Effective Remover including waterproof makeup and mascara leaving your skin thoroughly cleansed and refreshed

Natural fragrance free of alcohol parabens silicones and microplastics

Sustainable these wipes are made from biodegradable plant based tissue

Quality Ingredients enriched with lotus flower extract the wipes are suitable for everyday use with normal skin types

Naturally Derived our gentle wipe formula is made from 97 naturally derived ingredients

Usage remove one refreshing cleansing wipe and softly swipe on desired facial areas for effective cleansing No rubbing necessary Repeat until face feels clean and fresh Reseal package and dispose of wipe in the rubbish Do not flush
name: Nivea Refreshing Biodegradable Facial Cleansing Wipes 25 pack
